img.alt: Mineola Public School

a.title: Grand Prize Winner in Follett Challenge

img.title: Grand Prize Winner in Follett Challenge
img.p: Grand Prize Winner in Follett Challenge modal link

h3.a: Grand Prize Winner in Follett Challenge

div.p: Mineola High School was named the grand prizewinner in the 2020 Follett Challenge for changing the traditional methods of teaching and learning. According to its website, the Follett Challenge was started in 2010 as a library advocacy contest that has evolved into a program designed to help all... (more)

img.alt: Distance Learning
img.title: Pre-K to Grade 2 Distance Learning
img.p: Pre-K to Grade 2 Distance Learning modal link

div.p: Click here to access the distance learning resources for pre-k through grade 2 students: https://sites.google.com/view/prek-2distancelearning/home?authuser=0 (more)

Congratulations to Catherine Winski, a junior at Mineola High School who was named a 2020 Scholastic Awards National Medalist by The Alliance for Young Artists & Writers. She also have several submissions place with regional awards, including the Silver Key, Gold Key and Honorable... (more)

Resources for families: Coping during the COVID-19 health crisis
How do I talk to my children about what is going on? Talking to Your Children About Coronavirus: A Parent Resource PBS Kids- How to Talk to Your Kids About Coronavirus Hable con sus hijos sobre el COVID-19 Un recurso para padres... (more)
Join our staff as they read stories on our StoryTime YouTube Playlist. https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIjfiLxgnzyEIjpLmuLJ81TPjUF6lUdt9 (more)

a.title: A Best Community for Music Education

img.alt: A Best Community for Music Education
img.title: A Best Community for Music Education
img.p: A Best Community for Music Education modal link

h3.a: A Best Community for Music Education

div.p: For the twelfth consecutive year, Mineola has been honored with the Best Communities for Music Education designation from the NAMM Foundation for its outstanding commitment to music education. The Best Communities Music Education designation is awarded to districts that serve as a model for other... (more)

blockquote.style: caret-color: #000000; color: #000000; font-family: -webkit-standard; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: auto; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none;

div.style: font-family: Cambria, Georgia, serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #000000;

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 15.3333px; background-color: #ffffff; display: inline !important;

div.span: The May 19 budget vote and school board election have been postponed through an executive order by the Governor. Further information will be made available as to the rescheduled date and manner of the vote and election when the Governor provides further directives as to the same. Any prospective candidates for school board are directed by the Governor to cease collecting in-person signatures until further guidance is forthcoming about what the procedures will be for the rescheduled school board elections.

strong.style: caret-color: #000000; color: #000000; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 14.666666984558105px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: auto; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none;

div.strong: The “Grab-and-Go” Bagged Breakfast and Lunch is continuing during the month of April at each school between the hours of 10:00 and 12:00 pm. We hope this free meal program for students 18 years of age and under provides some relief for our families during this emergency school closure.

img.title: #MineolaProud Featured Tweet of the Week
img.alt: #MineolaProud Featured Tweet of the Week

div.blockquote: The mission of the Mineola Union Free School District is to inspire each student to be a life-long learner, pursue excellence, exhibit strength of character and contribute positively to a global society.
